summary: Internal email correspondence among U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) prosecutors regarding a draft response to defense counsel's letter complaining about the S2 indictment in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email discusses edits and tone, with the response due by end of day April 9, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the S2 indictment; defense counsel is complaining about the indictment on her behalf.

events.title: Deadline for Government Response to Defense Letter
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office must file a response to defense counsel's letter complaining about the S2 indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell by the end of the day.

keyFacts: The document is internal email correspondence among prosecutors in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY).
The subject is a draft response to a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell's defense counsel complaining about the S2 indictment.
The tone of the draft response is described as 'perfect' by one reviewer, with some edits attached.
The government's response to the defense letter is due by the end of the day on April 9, 2021.
The document references an attached defense letter for context, though its contents are not detailed here.
